import React, { Component } from 'react' import './user.css' class SignIn extends Component { state = { name: "", password: "" } handleNameChange = (event) => { this.setState({ ...this.state, name: event.target.name}) console.log('new name is ' + event.target.value) } handlePasswordChange = (event) => { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) console.log(this.state.name) } handleSubmit = () => { console.log(this.state) } render() { return (
{ //
// // //
}
Forgot Password?
) } } export default SignIn
